    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LobbyController​(ClientModel clientModel, GameView gameView, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      attaches listener to the stage-size to make the Logo responsive calls login method on some events, updates LoginStatus with StringProperty changes to PlayView and instantiates PlayController, after this client connected successfully to the server

    • Method Summary

      initialize new Translator for language change.
      private void login​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      sets Login-Button and PasswordField on Action, reads user input and connects to server, with credential from config.properties

        public LobbyController​(ClientModel clientModel,
                       GameView gameView,
                       javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        attaches listener to the stage-size to make the Logo responsive calls login method on some events, updates LoginStatus with StringProperty changes to PlayView and instantiates PlayController, after this client connected successfully to the server

        public void changeTranslator​(javafx.event.Event event)
        initialize new Translator for language change.
        Parameters:
        event - clickEvent on MenuItem

      • login

        private void login​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        sets Login-Button and PasswordField on Action, reads user input and connects to server, with credential from config.properties
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - button press or enter in passwordField
